full_text: JAN-02-2008 WED 12:01 PM FAX NO. 561835^^91 P. 03/05 IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT, IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY, FLORIDA CASE NO. 2006CF009454A STATE OF FLORIDA vs. JEFFREY EPSTEIN, Defendant. AGREED ORDER CONTINUING TRIAL, CANCELING PLEA CONFERENCE AND SETTING CASE FOR A PLEA CONFERENCE This cause came on to be heard upon the joint motion of the parties requesting that the Defendant's trial date be continued because of new information that needs to be investigated and the Court being fully advised, it is hereby ORDERED AND ADJUDGED that the Defendant's case scheduled for trial on January 7, 2008 is continued, that the plea conference scheduled for January 4, 2008 is canceled, and the case is scheduled for a plea conference on March 10, 2008 at 8:30 a.m. DONE AND ORDERED in West Palm Beach, Palm Beach County, Florida, this _ day of January, 2008. SANDRA McSORLEY Circuit Court Judge Copies: Jack A. Goldberger, Esquire Lanna Belohlavek, ASA (interoffice mail) 07/26/17 Page 91 of 114 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00030444

text_blocks.content: IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE FIFTEENTH JUDICIAL CIRCUIT, IN AND FOR PALM BEACH COUNTY, FLORIDA CASE NO. 2006CF009454A
STATE OF FLORIDA vs. JEFFREY EPSTEIN, Defendant.
AGREED ORDER CONTINUING TRIAL, CANCELING PLEA CONFERENCE AND SETTING CASE FOR A PLEA CONFERENCE

This cause came on to be heard upon the joint motion of the parties requesting that the Defendant's trial date be continued because of new information that needs to be investigated and the Court being fully advised, it is hereby ORDERED AND ADJUDGED that the Defendant's case scheduled for trial on January 7, 2008 is continued, that the plea conference scheduled for January 4, 2008 is canceled, and the case is scheduled for a plea conference on March 10, 2008 at 8:30 a.m.
DONE AND ORDERED in West Palm Beach, Palm Beach County, Florida, this _ day of January, 2008.
Copies: Jack A. Goldberger, Esquire Lanna Belohlavek, ASA (interoffice mail)

organizations: Circuit Court of the Fifteenth Judicial Circuit

additional_notes: The document is a court order continuing the trial of Jeffrey Epstein. The document is printed and contains no handwritten text or stamps. The document is dated January 2, 2008, and is related to a case in the Circuit Court of the Fifteenth Judicial Circuit in Palm Beach County, Florida.
